targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%ssh_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%http_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%https_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->>'dst_port')::int as port
FROM
  sniffer_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) and data->>'action' LIKE '%tcpscan%'

SELECT data->>'src_ip' as ip,
       data->>'ICMP_MSG' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%icmp%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%ftp_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%smtp_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%pop3_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'payload' as payload
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%dns_server%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%rdp_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%smb_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%postgres_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'payload' as payload
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%http_proxy_server%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%telnet_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%socks5_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%vnc_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%imap_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> ''

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->>'bytes_sent')::int as bytes_sent,
  (data->>'bytes_recv')::int as bytes_recv,
  (data->>'packets_sent')::int as packets_sent,
  (data->>'packets_recv')::int as packets_recv
FROM
  system_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT data->>'src_ip' as ip,
       data->>'raw_payload' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%tcppayload%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'username' as username,
       data->>'password' as password,
       data->>'server' as server
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%' AND data->>'ip' <> ''
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'raw_payload' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%udppayload%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->'sniffer'->>'memory')::float as sniffer,
  (data->'ftp_server'->>'memory')::float as ftp,
  (data->'dns_server'->>'memory')::float as dns,
  (data->'http_server'->>'memory')::float as http,
  (data->'https_server'->>'memory')::float as https,
  (data->'http_proxy_server'->>'memory')::float as http,
  (data->'pop3_server'->>'memory')::float as pop3,
  (data->'imap_server'->>'memory')::float as imap,
  (data->'rdp_server'->>'memory')::float as rdp,
  (data->'smb_server'->>'memory')::float as smb,
  (data->'smtp_server'->>'memory')::float as smtp,
  (data->'vnc_server'->>'memory')::float as vnc,
  (data->'ssh_server'->>'memory')::float as ssh,
  (data->'socks5_server'->>'memory')::float as socks5,
  (data->'telnet_server'->>'memory')::float as telnet,
  (data->'postgres_server'->>'memory')::float as postgres
FROM
  system_table
  system_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT $__time(date),
       data->>'type' as type
FROM   errors_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'type' <> ''

SELECT data->>'payload' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%creds_check%' AND data->>'payload' <> ''
ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->'sniffer'->>'cpu')::float as sniffer,
  (data->'ftp_server'->>'cpu')::float as ftp,
  (data->'dns_server'->>'cpu')::float as dns,
  (data->'http_server'->>'cpu')::float as http,
  (data->'https_server'->>'cpu')::float as https,
  (data->'http_proxy_server'->>'cpu')::float as http,
  (data->'pop3_server'->>'cpu')::float as pop3,
  (data->'imap_server'->>'cpu')::float as imap,
  (data->'rdp_server'->>'cpu')::float as rdp,
  (data->'smb_server'->>'cpu')::float as smb,
  (data->'smtp_server'->>'cpu')::float as smtp,
  (data->'vnc_server'->>'cpu')::float as vnc,
  (data->'ssh_server'->>'cpu')::float as ssh,
  (data->'socks5_server'->>'cpu')::float as socks5,
  (data->'telnet_server'->>'cpu')::float as telnet,
  (data->'postgres_server'->>'cpu')::float as postgres
FROM
  system_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
